```{r}
pacman::p_load(jsonlite, tidygraph, ggraph, visNetwork, tidyverse, lubridate, igraph)
```

```{r}
MC2 <- fromJSON("data/mc2_challenge_graph.json")
```

```{r}
MC2_nodes <- as_tibble(MC2$nodes) %>%
  select(id, shpcountry, rcvcountry)
```

```{r}
MC2_edges <- as_tibble(MC2$links) %>%
  select(source, target, hscode, arrivaldate, volumeteu,
         weightkg, valueofgoods_omu)
```
